original: Bolling, Sven Gösta, direktör, Alingsås, f. 30/12/01 i Gbg av disp. E. F. B. o. Anna Pettersson. G. 29 m. Dagmar Hellström. Barn: Lars 1. 35. — Stud:ex. i Borås 20, Gbgs hand :inst. 21. Prakt, i uti. bl. a. s. kont:chef v. Soc. Anonyme Electro-Lux i Paris 24-27, deläg. i ag:firma Bolling & Co. i Gbg 27-29, försäljn:-chef v. Komfieiktions A-B Oscar Molander i Alingsås 29-31, medstift. o. verkst. dir. i Konfektions A-B Drabant i Alingsås sed. 32. Medl. av Frimurarorden, W-Sex o. Rotary.
translated: Bolling, Sven Gösta, director, Alingsås, b. December 30, 1901 in Gothenburg to E.F.B. and Anna Pettersson. Married on March 29 to Dagmar Hellström. Children: Lars, b. 1935. Education: graduated from Borås in 1920, attended Gothenburg School of Business in 1921. Work experience includes, among others, being a department head at Electro-Lux in Paris from 1924-1927, co-owner of Bolling & Co. in Gothenburg from 1927-1929, sales manager at Komfieiktions A-B Oscar Molander in Alingsås from 1929-1931, co-founder and managing director of Konfektions A-B Drabant in Alingsås from 1932 onward. Member of the Freemasons, W-Sex, and Rotary.
